text: @newscientist @GretaThunberg why are y’all so pressed about her most likely having a virus during a PANDEMIC?? she literally breathes and y’all call her attention seeking. in what world would it be unlikely for her to have this disease? tom hanks has it for christs sake... just let her live, goddamn.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
